feedback.author: Patrick Star
feedback.feedback: Sandy's work is out of this world! She's a genius!

feedback.author: SpongeBob SquarePants
feedback.feedback: I've learned so much from Sandy. She's amazing!

feedback.author: Mr. Krabs
feedback.feedback: Her ideas helped improve the Krabby Patty formula!

feedback.author: Squidward Tentacles
feedback.feedback: Sandy's creativity is unmatched. She's truly an artist!

feedback.author: Plankton
feedback.feedback: Sandy's methods are ruthless... but effective. I must admit, she's clever!
